DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Cancer patient ( multiple myeloma solid tumor ) confirm evidence bone lesion Significant bone pain Exclusion Criteria Poor renal function Use investigational drug within 30 day visit 2 Dental surgery jaw within 6 week screen , plan 4 week study Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
